Package com.dhemery.core

Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action<S>
    An action that acts on a subject.
    Builder<T>
    Builds an object of type T.
    Condition
    A condition that may be satisfied or dissatisfied.
    Feature<S,F>
    Retrieves the value of a feature for a subject.
    Lazy<T>
    A lazy supplier that caches the first value it supplies, and always yields the cached value.
    MaybePresent
    An object that may be present.
    MaybeVisible
    An object that may be visible.
    Sampler<V>
    Samples a variable and retains the sample.
    StringDictionary
    A set of defined terms.
    Supplier<T>
    Supplies a value of type T.
    UnaryOperator<T>
    An operator that operates on a single value, and produces a value of the same type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultingTo<T>
    An operator that supplies a default value if its operand is null.
    Diagnostic  
    Lazily
    Lazy suppliers.
    LazyStream<T>
    A lazy stream over the objects supplied by an iterable source.
    Named
    An object that describes itself by a fixed name.
    NamedAction<S>
    An action described by a fixed name.
    NamedBuilder<T>
    A builder described by a fixed name.
    NamedCondition
    A condition described by a fixed name.
    NamedFeature<S,F>
    A feature described by a fixed name.
    NamedSampler<V>
    A sampler described by a fixed name.
    NamedSupplier<T>
    A supplier described by a fixed name.
    NamedUnaryOperator<T>
    An operator described by a fixed name.
    NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
    An operator that allows subclasses to operate on the operand without checking for null.
    PresentFeature
    A feature that determines whether its MaybePresent subject is present.
    Repeat
    Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
    Requiring<T>
    An operator that yields its operand if it satisfies some criteria.
    Self<T>
    A feature that yields its subject
    Supplied
    Static utility methods to create suppliers.
    SuppliedLazy<T>
    Lazily supplies an object obtained from another supplier.
    Until
    Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
    VisibleFeature
    A feature that determines whether its MaybeVisible subject is visible.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Expression  

Package com.dhemery.core Description

Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.
